projectGridLines.title: Title: Image Analytics based Quality variation reduction of Décor Paper Machines in Tribeni
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Image Analytics based Quality variation reduction of Décor Paper Machines in Tribeni

Description: To work on building Quality monitoring systems and data models for root cause

analysis of quality defects in Manufacturing process of a paper machine (from pulp to paper)

Skill sets: Knowledge of basic chemical and mechanical engineering concepts, Data analytics and

Machine learning in Excel and Python/R, Image Analytics

Traits expectation: Passionate about solving production and quality related problems through data

Expected learning: Techno-managerial skill set to drive mill-wide projects on Quality improvement

Specific courses required for project execution: Mechanical, Chemical Engg
